chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_49
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
Optional Investigations – Hepatitis B and Australia Antigen testing and Thyroid Stimulating Hormone
 ∙ Tetanus Toxoid Vaccination or Tetanus and Adult Diphtheria (td) Vaccine 
 ∙ IFA and Calcium Supplementation
 ∙ Calcium Supplementation – Two tablets of Calcium after first trimester for next six months
 ∙ Deworming
 ∙ Malaria Prophylaxis and Treatment
 ∙ Nutritional Counselling
 ∙ Micro birth planning
a. History Taking
The history taking is important because it will help to:
 ∙ Identify whethe
